hero.headline: Contactless Dining Experience
hero.subheadline: Let customers order directly from their table. Reduce wait times, free up staff, and increase table turnover.

features.title: Scan to Order
features.description: No app download required. Just scan the QR code on the table to open the full menu.

features.title: Self-Service Convenience
features.description: Guests can explore the menu at their own pace and order when they are ready.
list: Skip the wait for a waiter

features.title: Operational Efficiency
features.description: Orders go straight to the kitchen/POS, labeled with the correct table number.

reviews.author: Sarah Jenkins
reviews.text: Cravings transformed how we handle orders during rush hour. The digital menu is a lifesaver!

reviews.author: David Chen
reviews.text: The best investment we made this year. Customers love scanning the code and ordering directly.

reviews.author: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.text: Insanely easy to update. We change our specials daily and it takes seconds.

reviews.author: Michael Chang
reviews.text: Inventory management is finally under control. We cut wastage by 20% in the first month.

reviews.author: Priya Patel
reviews.text: Marketing tools are powerful. The automated campaigns brought back so many old customers.

faq.question: How do we identify the table?
faq.answer: Each QR code is unique and linked to a specific table number in your system.

faq.question: Do customers pay on the phone?
faq.answer: They can order on the phone and pay at the end, or you can enable upfront payment integration.
